product_description: Everyday leggings give you a sleek and slim look in a polished knit with just the right balance of structure and stretch.
product_details_and_care:
Everyday leggings give you a sleek and slim look in a polished knit with just the right balance of structure and stretch.
29 1/2" inseam; 10" leg opening; 11 1/4" front rise; 15" back rise (size Medium)
Pull-on style
68% rayon, 28% nylon, 4% spandex
Dry clean
Made in the USA of imported fabric
